entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
